wikipedia_page.main: Austin Berkley (born 28 January 1973) is an English former professional footballer who played as a Winger. His most successful spell was at Shrewsbury Town, where he made 174 appearances in five years, scoring 12 goals.

response: He made his debut for the Shrews on 8 May 1999 in the Third Division 3–0 away win against Torquay United at Plainmoor. He came on as a second-half substitute for Austin Berkley.
The academy has a partnership with local English Premier League-club Crystal Palace dating back to the former Community School. Former Shrewsbury Town winger Austin Berkley teaches at the Academy.
